### checkExtensions() {#a1565934563ca4588b6385767ae235516}

<MemberDefinition

Validates and converts extension names into internal enum values.

<SectionUser title="Returns">
Returns a reference to the unknown SPIR-V extension name from the list if present, or an empty <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> on success.
</SectionUser>
